remarks: Convert an operation closure law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement:
caovcl.1 $e |- ( ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) -> ( x F y ) e. S ) $.
caovcl $p |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> ( A F B ) e. S ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
